org.firewaterframework.mappers.validation
Class MapPropertyBindingResult

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.validation.AbstractBindingResult
      org.springframework.validation.AbstractPropertyBindingResult
          org.firewaterframework.mappers.validation.MapPropertyBindingResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult, org.springframework.validation.Errors
public class MapPropertyBindingResult
extends org.springframework.validation.AbstractPropertyBindingResult

This is an extension to Spring's BindingResult to allow for binding into Maps instead of just POJOs.

See Also:
